docs.lead_paragraph: ''The Body Clock Guide to Better Health,'' by Dr. Michael Smolensky and Lynne Lamberg. Owl Books/Henry Holt & Company, $16. Most of us can tell time, but few of us know how to tell body time, according to the authors of this book on (take your pick) chronobiology, chronomedicine, chronotherapy and chronorecord-keeping.

headline.main: Learning to Tell Time on the Body's Clock

docs.abstract: John Langone reviews book The Body Clock Guide to Better Health by Dr Michael Smolensky and Lynne Lamberg; photo (M)
